practice_phrases.target: Because I want to speak with you.
Because I want to meet people.
Because I want to speak very well.
Because I want to practise today.

practice_phrases.known: 因为我在尽力学习英语。
practice_phrases.target: Because I'm trying to learn English.

practice_phrases.known: 因为我想知道答案是什么。
practice_phrases.target: Because I want to know what the answer is.

practice_phrases.known: 因为我猜我很快就要开始了。
practice_phrases.target: Because I guess I'm going to start soon.

practice_phrases.known: 因为我想尽可能多地练习说话。
practice_phrases.target: Because I want to practise speaking as often as possible.
